      • typeof

        public boolean typeof(gate.Annotation X,
                      gate.Annotation Y)
        Checks to see if the word X is a type of Y (i.e. red is a type of colour). This relies on WordNet and will always return false if the optional runtime parameter has not been set.
        Parameters:
        X - the Token annotation spanning word X
        Y - the Token annotation spanning word Y
        Returns:
        true if X is a type of Y given WordNet, false otherwise
